Identification_Area.title: IDA AND GASPRA GROUNDBASED SPECTRA V1.0

Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

External_Reference.reference_text: Chapman, C. R., and M.J. Gaffey, Spectral Reflectances of the Asteroids, in 'Asteroids' (T. Gehrels, Ed.) 1064-1089, University of Arizona Press, Tucson, 1979.

Clark, B.E., J.F. Bell, F.P. Fanale, and D.J. O'Connor, Results of the Seven Color Asteroid Survey: Infrared spectral observations of ~50-km size S-, K-, and M-type asteroids, Icarus, Vol. 113, pp. 387-402, 1995.
Goldader, J.D., D.J. Tholen, D.P. Cruikshank, and W.K. Hartmann, Galileo Support Observations of Asteroid 951 Gaspra, Astron. J., 102, 1503-1509, 1991.
Xu, S., R.P. Binzel, T.H. Burbine, and S.J. Bus, Small Main-belt Asteroid Spectroscopic Survey: Initial results, Icarus, 115, 1-35, 1995.
Zellner, B., D.J. Tholen, and E.F. Tedesco, The Eight-Color Asteroid Survey: Results for 589 Minor Planets, Icarus 61, 355-416, 1985.

Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_name: IDA AND GASPRA GROUNDBASED SPECTRA V1.0
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_terse_desc: Groundbased spectra of the asteroids Gaspra and Ida, extracted from catalogs in the Small Bodies Node archives.
Data_Set_PDS3.abstract_desc: Groundbased spectra of the asteroids Gaspra and Ida, extracted from catalogs in the Small Bodies Node archives.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_desc:
Data Set Overview =================
This data set is intended to include all published spectra of the asteroids (243) Ida and (951) Gaspra. These have been gathered from existing PDS data sets archive data sets. Four spectra of Gaspra and two of Ida are included. The 24-Color Survey spectrum of 243 Ida has not been included in this collection, since for practical purposes the 24-color survey has been superseded by subsequent surveys such as ECAS and SMASS. The full 24-Color Survey is available in the PDS main archive.
Data ====
The data are included in the following files:
ecasida.tab - ECAS spectrum of Ida, from Zellner et al. (1985) smassida.tab - SMASS spectra of Ida, from Xu et al. (1995)
ecasgaspra.tab - ECAS spectrum of Gaspra, from Zellner et al. (1985) smassgaspra.tab - SMASS spectra of Gaspra, from Xu et al. (1995) irgaspra.tab - IR spectrum of Gaspra, from Goldader et al. (1991) scasgaspra.tab - SCAS spectrum of Gaspra, from Clark et al. (1995)
Data_Set_PDS3.confidence_level_note:
Confidence Level Overview =========================
This is a compilation of all published spectra of the asteroids 243 Ida and 951 Gaspra. The data come from various sources. The original reference should be consulted for the confidence level of any given observation.
Review ======
This data set underwent formal review in October 1995.
Data Coverage and Quality =========================
This data set is intended to include all published spectra of 243 Ida and 951 Gaspra. It is complete through the year 1994.
